name: LATE TO THE PARTY
description:
LATE TO THE PARTY is a tiny treasure hunt game where you need to find all the party items before your guests arrive.

The game was made with Adventuron for the february 2020 #treasurehuntjam

If you are having trouble solving the puzzles try using the examine command a lot. For example. EXAMINE LAMP or just X LAMP. 

Direction movement can be shortened by just using N for NORTH S for SOUTH etc.

The game uses two words command in the verb noun format. For example. HIT LAMP.

This means that sometimes something is implied. For example instead of  HIT LAMP WITH HAMMER. Hammer is implied in HIT LAMP or LAMP is implied in USE HAMMER.

If you are really stuck just DM me and I will help you with some hints.

I hope you will enjoy the game even though you are LATE TO THE PARTY! 

Best regards!

Michael!
